name: Know Sure Thing (KST)
formula: KST = Σ ROC_i * SMA(ROC_i, w_i) with weights

name: Option Implied Volatility (IV)
formula: Solve σ in Black-Scholes given market price

name: Linear Regression Slope
formula: slope from OLS over window n

name: R-squared (Trend Strength)
formula: R^2 from OLS over window n

name: Anchored VWAP (AVWAP)
formula: Same as VWAP but start at anchor timestamp

name: Arnaud Legoux Moving Average (ALMA)
formula: ALMA = Σ w_i*price_{t-i} with gaussian weights

name: Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA)
formula: KAMA_t = KAMA_{t-1} + SC*(price_t - KAMA_{t-1}), SC from ER

name: Linear Regression Line (LSMA)
formula: Slope, intercept via OLS on (t, price) over window n

name: Supertrend
formula: Upper=(HL2 + m*ATR); Lower=(HL2 - m*ATR); flip by trend

name: Yang-Zhang Volatility
formula: Combination of overnight, rs, and open-close var

name: MACD
notes: Polygon provides a direct endpoint for this indicator.

name: Open Interest (per contract)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Option Delta
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Option Gamma
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Option Implied Volatility (IV)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Option Theta
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Option Vega
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Put/Call Ratio (Open Interest)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Put/Call Ratio (Volume)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Total Call Open Interest (chain)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: Total Put Open Interest (chain)
notes: Returned in options snapshot payload (real-time/current). Historical time series requires storing snapshots.

name: VIX (S&P 500 30D IV)
notes: Fetch via Indices API. Symbol format often 'I:VIX', etc.

name: VIX3M (S&P 500 3M IV)
notes: Fetch via Indices API. Symbol format often 'I:VIX', etc.

name: VIX9D (S&P 500 9D IV)
notes: Fetch via Indices API. Symbol format often 'I:VIX', etc.

name: Exponential Moving Average (EMA)
notes: Polygon provides a direct endpoint for this indicator.

name: Simple Moving Average (SMA)
notes: Polygon provides a direct endpoint for this indicator.

name: VWAP (Session)
endpoint: `Grouped Daily: /v2/aggs/grouped/locale/us/market/stocks/{date} -> vwap; Intraday: compute from trades /v3/trades/{ticker} or minute aggs`
notes: Daily grouped endpoint returns VWAP; for intraday/session VWAP use trades or minute bars.
